item.description:
Come join us for Thai on the roof, if it is raining we will eat inside.

 

What you need to know about this event:

  • They have a great selection of Thai food.
  • Check out their website http://andamanrestaurant.com/
  • We will be on the roof if it is raining we will eat inside.
  • There will be a limit to the RSVP's only put in your YES if you are serious about attending it wouldn't be right to take a spot and then not show up.
  • The organizers reserve the right to remove an RSVP if you have been a previous no show. 
  • Seeing we will be on the roof there are no alcoholic beverages served up there. 
  • You are responsible for paying your part of the bill including tax and tip, and we ask that you not leave before the bill is paid.

 

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.   Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

Look forward to seeing you,

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the roof take the elevator/stairs to find us.
item.name: Dinner on the roof top.
